pr_title: HBASE-25235 Cleanup the deprecated methods in TimeRange

timeline.message: HBASE-25235 Cleanup the deprecated methods in TimeRange
HBASE-25235 Cleanup the deprecated methods in TimeRange

timeline.bodyText: Probably this needs to be called out separately in the release notes as it is not binary-compatible. Shouldn't matter as it is introduced in major release, but probably worth it.
timeline.author: HorizonNet

replies.bodyText: Will mention this in release note. We removed all the public constructors so it should be final...
replies.author: Apache9

timeline.bodyText: Seems to be unrelated to the actual change.
